biography_text: DAVIS, Susan A., a Representative from California; born in Cambridge, Middlesex County, Mass., April 13, 1944; B.A., University of California, Berkeley, Calif., 1965; M.S.W., University of North Carolina, Chapel Hill, N.C., 1968; member of the San Diego, Calif., board of education, 1983-1992, president, San Diego, Calif., board of education 1989-1992; executive director, Aaron Price Fellows, 1990-1994; member of the California state assembly, 1994-2000; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Seventh and to the eight succeeding Congresses (January 3, 2001-present).
